import React from 'react'; import "./about.css"; import AboutImg from "../../src/assets/a-1.jpg"; import CV from "../../src/assets/s-cv.pdf"; import Info from './Info'; function About() { return (

About Me

My introduction

Software Developer, I am constantly seeking to expand my knowledge and skills in the ever-evolving field of technology. With a passion for problem-solving and innovation, I am dedicated to staying up-to-date on the latest trends and advancements in the industry. Through my coursework and hands-on experience, I have developed a strong foundation in programming. I am eager to apply my expertise and collaborate with others to drive meaningful change and progress in the world of technology.

Download CV
) } export default About
